items.name: administer alerts
items.label: Manage Insight alerts
items.description: Grants the ability to ignore alerts and change settings on a Drupal website using the "Fix it Now" feature.

items.name: revoke insight installs
items.label: Revoke Insight sites
items.description: Grants the ability to revoke sites so they can no longer submit data.

items.name: deploy to non-prod
items.label: Pull and deploy code, files, or databases to non-production environments
items.description: Grants the ability to enable or disable live development and non-production work.

items.name: deploy to prod
items.label: Deploy code, files, or databases to the production environment

items.name: pull from prod
items.label: Pull files or databases from the production environment

items.label: Move files to non-production environments

items.label: Move files to the production environment

items.name: move file from prod
items.label: Move files from production environments

items.name: move file from non-prod
items.label: Move files from non-production environments

items.label: Clear Varnish cache for non-production environments

items.label: Clear Varnish cache for the production environment

items.label: Add or remove domains for non-production environments

items.label: Add or remove domains for the production environment

items.label: Add or remove SSL certificates for the production environment

items.label: Add or remove SSL certificates for the non-production environments

items.name: administer team
items.label: Add or remove a user of a team
items.description: Granting this permission will give any user with this role full permissions on this team.

items.name: access cloud api
items.label: Access the Cloud API
items.description: Grants the ability to use the API and bypass all other permissions via command line tools.

items.label: Modify cron tasks for non-production environments

items.label: Modify cron tasks for the production environment

items.label: Increase the search index limit for a subscription

items.label: Edit the search schema for a subscription

items.label: View and edit any support tickets for a subscription
